subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: When their semifinal match was postponed Saturday because of weather, David Ferrer led, 5-2, in the first set. When it resumed Sunday, Novak Djokovic battered Ferrer throughout.
snippet: When their semifinal match was postponed Saturday because of weather, David Ferrer led, 5-2, in the first set. When it resumed Sunday, Novak Djokovic battered Ferrer throughout.
